text: I like `IR` for its level of abstraction - low enough, but not too much. For example, with  IRTools I have direct access to `%new`, but don't have to deal with things like phi nodes. I can even export `IR` as part of my package's API because it's quite user-friendly - something `CodeInfo` will never be

text: I think the issue for `CodeInfo` is more about the tooling and safety checks, which actually exists inside Julia. I don’t see why `CodeInfo` along with `IRCode` can’t be a directly replacement with `IR`
